node.name: vcfcadd
node.label: VCF: CADD
node.description: Annotations with Combined Annotation Dependent Depletion (CADD)

description.p: See https://github.com/lindenb/jvarkit/wiki/VcfCadd. Annotate a VCF with Combined Annotation Dependent Depletion (CADD) (Kircher & al. A general framework for estimating the relative pathogenicity of human genetic variants. Nat Genet. 2014 Feb 2. doi: 10.1038/ng.2892. PubMed http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/24487276. )
